name: TrashKitty
description:
Controls

A & D or Arrows - Move/Hop

Space - Exit Trashcan

A cat stumbles upon a trash can and becomes the well beloved video game character TrashKitty.

Meet the trashman and take care of his trash!

Can you meet his demands and go through his frustrating world?

His goal is to teach you how to handle your problem even if you keep failing over and over again.

But it's up to you, take care of the trash and make him proud!

Basically I made this game in less than two weeks so I'm expecting a lot of issues so make sure you DM me those juicy bugs for me to squash!

Design and Programming by Madnukin  https://twitter.com/MadNukin
Music and SFX by ConnorGrail https://twitter.com/ConnorGrail
Trashman voice by Miroko https://twitter.com/MirokoBG

I really hope you enjoy TrashKitty and have a wonderful day!
